title: Good minimal models with nowhere vanishing holomorphic $1$-forms
authors: Feng Hao, Zichang Wang and Lei Zhang
abstract:
Popa and Schnell show that any holomorphic 1-form on a smooth projective
variety of general type has zeros. In this article, we show that a smooth good
minimal model has a holomorphic 1-form without zero if and only if it admits an
analytic fiber bundle structure over a positive dimensional abelian variety.
